sense.gloss: trial and tribulation, hardships, privations, difficulties
trials and tribulations, adversities, suffering hardships and troubles
trials and tribulations, adversities, suffering hardships and troubles

r_ele.r: かんなんなんじをたまにす

sense.gloss: problems that affect a period of time, hardships peculiar to an age, hard problems of the times

sdata.j: さまざまな↑艱難辛苦↑↓かんなんしんく↓を↑乗↑↓の↓り↑越↑↓こ↓え、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑南極大陸↑↓なんきょくたいりく↓↑単独↑↓たんどく↓↑横断↑↓おうだん↓を↑成↑↓な↓し↑遂↑↓と↓げた。
sdata.e: He overcame all sorts of hardship and setbacks to succeed in a solo crossing of Antarctica.

sdata.j: ↑艱難↑↓かんなん↓↑汝↑↓なんじ↓を↑玉↑↓たま↓にす。
sdata.e: Adversity makes a man wise, not rich.

sdata.j: ↑艱難↑↓かんなん↓↑汝↑↓なんじ↓を↑玉↑↓たま↓にす。
